Uses of Class
com.salesforce.omakase.util.As

  • Packages that use As 
    Package Description
    com.salesforce.omakase.util
    Utilities and helpers.

    • Uses of As in com.salesforce.omakase.util

      Methods in com.salesforce.omakase.util that return As 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      As As.add(String name, Iterable<?> iterable)
      Adds a member to this toString representation.
      As As.add(String name, Object value)
      Adds a member to this toString representation.
      As As.addIf(boolean condition, String name, Object value)
      Same as add(String, Object), except it will only add the member if the given condition is true.
      As As.addUnlessEmpty(String name, Iterable<?> iterable)
      Same as add(String, Iterable), except it will only add the member if the iterable is not empty.
      As As.fields()
      Specifies that all fields should be added.
      As As.indent()
      Specifies that this toString representation should indent and write each member on a separate line.
      As As.named(String name)
      Creates a new string representation helper described by the given name.
      static As As.string(Object object)
      Creates a new string representation helper for the given object.
